mapper.insert: INSERT INTO audio.rule_log (ip_addr, time, content, member_id, top_level_name, middle_level_name, bottom_level_name, library_file_name, using_log_no) VALUES(#{ip_addr}, #{time}, #{content}, #{member_id}, #{top_level_name}, #{middle_level_name}, #{bottom_level_name}, #{library_file_name}, #{using_log_no});
mapper.sql: SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS row_num, no, ip_addr, time, content, member_id, top_level_name, middle_level_name, bottom_level_name, library_file_name, using_log_no FROM audio.rule_log WHERE top_level_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR middle_level_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR bottom_level_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR ip_addr LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR time LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR member_id LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR library_file_name LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' ORDER BY no DESC
